text: Beyond the Last Mountain (1976) is a Pakistani English-language movie. It was directed and written by Javed Jabbar. Being Pakistanâ€™s first and only English- language movie, which was shown at the first Bombay International Film Festival in 1976, it was also released in Urdu version with title Musafir.
